pucker.translation[0].definitions[0].def: if part of your face puckers, or if you pucker it, it becomes tight or stretched, for example because you are going to cry or kiss someone
pucker.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Her mouth puckered, and she started to cry.
pucker.translation[0].definitions[1].def: if cloth puckers, it gets lines or folds in it and is no longer flat
